title: Racing Legend Scott Pruett!
description:
Scott Pruett is a racing legend who has won in some of the fastest cars ever. He's raced in Indy Car, NASCAR, prototypes, Sports Cars, and IMSA. If anyone is a driver and racer, he is. 

 

Read all about Scott: http://www.scottpruett.com/

Buy Scott's wine: https://www.pruettvineyard.com/

T: @thesmokingtire, @zackklapman @scottpruett01

IG: @thesmokingtire, @fakezackklapman @scottpruett01

 

WATCH the show! https://youtu.be/S6MGFa1dll4
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
